clinical_study.brief_title: Efficacy Evaluation of the Probiotics Containing Skincare Products on Skin
clinical_study.official_title: Efficacy Evaluation of the Probiotics Containing Skincare Products on Skin

collaborator.agency: Chia Nan University of Pharmacy and Science

brief_summary.textblock: Previous studies on skin health with Lactic acid bacteria (LAB) have been published for many years, including prevention of skin diseases and improvement of skin conditions. In this clinical study, the investigators researched the benefit effects of heat-killed Lactobacillus plantarum cream on skin health.

detailed_description.textblock: To evaluate the smear of probiotic cream could be ameliorative effects of the whole face skin such as moisturizing, whitening, anti-wrinkle and so on.

primary_outcome.description: The changes of skin condition by VISIA Complexion Analysis System

secondary_outcome.description: The changes of skin moisture by Skicon-200EX and Corneometer CM 825
The changes of skin color by DermaSpectrometer

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Healthy volunteers between the ages of 20-60.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Subjects with photosensitivity (Sun allergy).
- Subjects are undergoing medical therapy for skin diseases.
- Subjects with severe hyperpigmentation.
- Subjects with diabetes.
- Subjects with cosmetics allergy.
- Subjects who have recently participated laser therapies or other treatments are not suitable for sun.
